ygData.subject: RE: Resistance and Rhythym songs
ygData.msgSnippet: You can get a resist message sometimes. Last night in Perma while being jackhammered by about 6 or 7 goblin casters I had both Elemental and Guardian up and I
ygData.messageBody:
You can get a resist message sometimes. Last night in Perma while being
jackhammered by about 6 or 7 goblin casters I had both Elemental and
Guardian up and I fully resisted one Force Shock. Of course the other 8
Force Shocks I didn't fare too well against.
Even though you don't get a resist message you do take less damage. Just
like when sometimes our bellows only do 1 point of damage instead of the
full amount. When the damage gets to zero then it is resisted.

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


8)-----Original Message-----
8)From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:Dean_Kimes@...]
8)Sent: Friday, July 30, 1999 10:31 AM
8)To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
8)Subject: [eqbards] Resistance and Rhythym songs
8)
8)
8)From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
8)
8)I don't recall seeing a resistance message ever for a
8)partially resistable
8)spell like Direct Damage (DD) ones. However, when the caster
8)hits me and my
8)health bar doesn't move from a spell that can do up to 40
8)points, I know I
8)took at most 3 or 4, I don't have that many hp's so the bar
8)movement is
8)still pretty visible. Also I resisted 4 straight roots,
8)bummer if I'm gonna
8)fail that would have been my choice, and 7 straight walking
8)sleeps. All in
8)all I seldom take any measurable damage from spells, but then
8)again my MR is
8)jacked up pretty high for my level. Since it is unlikely to
8)improve much at
8)this point, barring increased song effects, I will
8)undoubtedly have more
8)trouble at higher levels. 113 vs a hag probably isnt
8)anywhere near as good
8)as having 70 somethin against lvl 15-17 casters.
8)
8)Kitasi
8)
8)-----Original Message-----
8)From: Blair, Keith (Keith Blair) [mailto:kblair@...]
8)Sent: Thursday, July 29, 1999 12:34 PM
8)To: eqbards@onelist.com
8)Subject: RE: [eqbards] fighting twinking
8)
8)
8)From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
8)
8)> and cold resist, not magic resist? I was using Elemental and
8)> Guardian Rhythms last night with a battle drum fighting hags
8)> in Unrest (113 MR, 74 FR and CR, a little more or less for
8)> others). I didn't see a single resist message. Do you even
8)> get a resist message if you resist a DD? When I did the same
8)
8)As far as I've experienced the Rhythm songs have been
8)completely useless.
8)Just my experience though..
8)
